intro.title:
Enjoy
Cam{{flower}}pus Life
With Global
Bud{{eye}}dy
intro.privacy:
Once you tap ‘Start with phone number’
You agree to our <privacyLink>privacy policy</privacyLink>

phone.title: What is your phone number
phone.titleDescription: Your phone number is only used for verification
phone.label: Phone Number
phone.warning: Your phone number must start with 010
phone.footer: This information will not be shared nor displayed on your profile

verification.title: We have sent a verification code
verification.label: Verification code
verification.notReceived: Please enter the code within the time limit.

notification.title: Can Buddyya help you chat with your new friends?
notification.description: Allow notifications to be notified of new matches, messages, and other news

studentInfo.title: Let's create your Buddya student ID
studentInfo.description: The personal information on your student ID must be accurate as it will be used to match with others on Budyya!

universitySelect.title: What university are you enrolled in?
universitySelect.description: Your university will be shown on your Buddyya profile.
universitySelect.label: Select University

studentType.title: Which of these apply to you?

gender.title: What is your gender?
gender.description: Your gender will be shown on your profile and will be used in the matching process.
gender.label: Gender

name.title: What is your name?
name.description: For easier communication, Please enter your name in English
name.label: Nickname
name.footer: This will be displayed on your profile.
name.warning: Please enter your name in English

country.title: Where are you from?
country.description: This will be shown on your profile

language.title: Which languages can you speak?
language.description: This will be shown on your profile to help you find great match with people who can speak the same languages.
language.maxSelect: You can choose up to {{count}} languages

major.title: What are you studying in university?

interest.title: What are your interests?
interest.description: Choose your interest and match with people with same interests

userGuide.title: Community Guidelines
userGuide.description: Our community is a space where we respect each other. Please review the following guidelines.
userGuide.guideline2: Racist or discriminatory remarks are not tolerated
userGuide.guideline3: All posts should be in English so everyone can understand.
userGuide.guideline4: Buddyya is a community for real university students. Please treat each other with respect.
userGuide.terms:
By tapping “Start Buddyya,”
You agree to our <termsLink>Terms of service.</termsLink>
userGuide.checkboxText: I agree to the community guidelines
